info.name: AO3 dark for OLED screens
info.description:
AO3 dark for OLED screens. A higher contrast, true black background version of my AO3 Plain skin in the brown colour scheme. No other style settings or customisation because this website is buggy as hell.  

To install it using AO3's skins feature, copy and paste the CSS into a new skin and keep all the default options.
